original_text: While I am still alive, please be kind to me. Continue to love me, as the Lord loves his people. And if I die, 15 continue to be kind to my family. Even when the Lord removes every one of your enemies from the earth, do not forget about my family.’
korean_text: 너는 내가 사는 날 동안에 여호와의 인자하심을 내게 베풀어서 나를 죽지 않게 할 뿐 아니라

sentences.original_text: as the Lord loves his people
continue to be kind to my family
Even when the Lord removes every one of your enemies from the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 당신의 모든 원수들을 땅에서 제거하시더라도

sentences.original_text: do not forget about my family
